help.fundMultiple.description: To save on network fees, you can create multiple sell offers with only one transaction!
help.fundMultiple.title: fund multiple sell offers
help.instantTradeSell.description:
Allow a buyer who matches your sell offer to automatically get in a trade with you!

To enable this, Peach will receive your selected payment data to instantly share them with a buyer that matches all of your criteria.

This data is encrypted and cannot be read by third parties other than Peach.
help.instantTradeSell.title: instant trade
help.instantTradeBuy.description:
Allow a seller who matches your offer to automatically get in a trade with you!

Sellers that don't fit your criteria can still see you offer. They will wait for you to accept their match.
help.instantTradeBuy.title: instant trade
matchDetails.title: match details
offerPreferences.competingSellOffersBelo: $0 competing sell offers below this premium
offerPreferences.competingBuyOffersBelow: $0 competing buy offers below this premium
